content.text: a) dedicated to the installation of information technology cables (e.g. direct buried cable, buried conduit)  see Table 2 for a non-exhaustive list of design and planning issues;
b) shared with other services (e.g. a utility tunnel designed to deliver electricity, steam or water).
Information technology cabling pathways within utility tunnels may consist of indoor pathway systems in  accordance with EN 50174-2.

tables.html:
